messages.message: Who would be our expert for Jenkins/testing/CI setup?
Not sure where to go to 1) stop travis from running tests for a certain directory, and 2) allow travis to run tests within a docker container
what do you want to stop running? and because I’m not an expert, we don’t do 2) today. That’s only protected from Jenkins runs post merge. We can give it another try tho
I figured it would be you but didnt want to bug you too much :joy:  it looks like travis will run the standard test command in model-service, but because of 2), I don’t want it to do that
Yup, look in `shared-utils/build-utils/shared/src/py/run_tests_for_affected_code.py` and add the model service path to `MODULES_TO_IGNORE`
I’m not sure I’ll ever get used to people referring to TravisCI and not me.
at least travis kalanick is no longer making headlines :slightly_smiling_face:
